title: Serenity Sleep System by Immrama Institute [FLAC]
description:

YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re not alone. More than one third of all adults experience difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep, and one in four suffer from chronic, long-term sleep disorders that interfere with work, driving, and other activities.

Sleep problems can wreak havoc on your physical and mental health. Sleep deprivation causes added stress and strain on your body and weakens your immune system, resulting in a whole host of severe health issues.

How can we help?

Our new Serenity Sleep System offers you an effective, drug-free way to achieve deep restful sleep.

How does it work?

The Serenity Sleep System uses brainwave audio technology designed to guide your mind quickly and effortlessly into a state of deep restful sleep so you wake up feeling energized and refreshed. The Serenity Sleep System promotes brain activity in the Delta state, the state in which your body does most of its healing and rejuvenation. While your brain is in this deep Delta state, it releases neurochemicals that reduce and repair the damage to your mind and body caused by stress.

How effective is it?

The primary audio track Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Serenity Ã¢â‚¬â€œ is sixty minutes long, but it works so well youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll probably never hear the end of the track. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be fast asleep long before you reach it!

Best of all, regular use of the Serenity Sleep System will train your brain to achieve to a healthy natural sleep pattern, so in a short time youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll no longer need to listen to the audio track to help you fall asleep and stay asleep through the night.
